00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00036 template<class T>
00037 class CImageConstColumnIterator
00038 {
00039 protected: // attributes
00041         unsigned int m_RowWidth;
00043     T* m_pCurr;
00045         T* m_pEnd;
00046 public:
00053         inline CImageConstColumnIterator(UINT32 ColumnIndex, T* pStartRowIndex, T* pMaxRowIndex, unsigned int RowWidth);
00055         inline CImageConstColumnIterator& operator=(const CImageConstColumnIterator& It);
00058         inline CImageConstColumnIterator End() const;
00060         inline CImageConstColumnIterator& operator++(){ m_pCurr-=m_RowWidth; return *this; }
00062         inline CImageConstColumnIterator operator++(int){CImageConstColumnIterator t=*this;m_pCurr-=m_RowWidth;return t;}
00064         inline const T& operator*(){return *m_pCurr;}
00066         inline const T& operator[](UINT32 i) {return *(m_pCurr-i*m_RowWidth);}
00069         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageConstColumnIterator& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator& q);
00072         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageConstColumnIterator& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator& q);
00075         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageConstColumnIterator& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator& q);
00076 };
00077 
00078 template<class T>
00079 inline CImageConstColumnIterator<T>::CImageConstColumnIterator(UINT32 ColumnIndex, T* pStartRowIndex, 
00080                                                                                                                                                  T* pMaxRowIndex, unsigned int RowWidth):
00081                 m_pCurr(pStartRowIndex+ColumnIndex), m_pEnd(pMaxRowIndex+ColumnIndex), m_RowWidth(RowWidth)
00082 {
00083 }
00084 
00085 template<class T>
00086 inline CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& 
00087                 CImageConstColumnIterator<T>::operator=(const CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& It)
00088 {
00089         m_pCurr  = It.m_pCurr;
00090         m_pEnd   = It.m_pEnd;
00091         m_RowWidth=It.m_RowWidth;
00092         return *this;
00093 }
00094 
00095 template<class T>
00096 inline CImageConstColumnIterator<T> CImageConstColumnIterator<T>::End() const
00097 {
00098         CImageConstColumnIterator t = *this;
00099         t.m_pCurr = m_pEnd;
00100         return t;
00101 }
00102 
00103 template<class T>
00104 inline bool operator==(const CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& q)
00105 {
00106         return (p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr);
00107 }
00108 
00109 template<class T>
00110 inline bool operator!=(const CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& q)
00111 {
00112         return !(p==q);
00113 }
00114 
00115 template<class T>
00116 inline bool operator<(const CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& p, const CImageConstColumnIterator<T>& q)
00117 {
00118         return (p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr);
00119 }
00120 
00121 } // end namespace ipl
00122 
00123 #endif //_IPL98_IMAGECONSTCOLUMNIT_H
